Description: Stamp (vessel): half-qisṭ. Measure of olive-oil. Four line Kufic inscription. Made of green glass.
Curator's comments: See also OA+ 4339. From the same die: Miles, G.C. 1958. ‘Contributions to Arabic metrology’ I. New York, 70. Cf. Launois, Aimée. 1957. Estampilles et poids faibles en verre Omeyyades et Abbasides au Musée Arabe du Caire, ‘Mélanges islamologiques’ III, 119; Miles, G.C. 1963. ‘Contributions to Arabic metrology’ II (II. Peter Ruthven collection). New York, 16; Balog, P. 1976. ‘Ummayad, ʿAbbasid and Ṭūlūnid glass weights and vessel-stamps’. New York, 224-6.
Bibliographic references: Morton 1985 / A Catalogue of Early Islamic Glass Stamps (124)
Associated names: Named in inscription: Yazīd b. Abī Yazīd
